AUTHOR: palmtree5
INSTALL_MSG:
Thanks for installing SRRecords, a cog for getting the best times for a game from speedrun.com.
[p]help SRRecords to see commands. No additional dependencies needed.
For support: <http://support.palmtree5.com>

If you like my work and want to support me, please consider becoming a Patron over at <https://patreon.com/palmtree5>
NAME: SRRecords
SHORT: Cog for getting world records for various games
DESCRIPTION: Gets world records for the specified game from speedrun.com
